page.title: 16Recreation around Widmerpool
page.content: Widmerpool is in the area covered by the{Quorn Hunt,}which during the sea- son appears on about 3 Mondays and an occasional Saturday. Members of the Royal Family hunt with the Quorn and enjoy the hospitality of one Widmer- pool farmer. With a stud farm in Wid- merpool and riding stables in nearby Keyworth,{horse riding}is a popular pastime. One Widmerpool lady takes an active interest in the{Riding for the {Disabled}movement. There is a tradi- tion of{rough shooting}going back to the days of the Hall with its game- keepers and organised shoots. One farmer still allows shooting on his land, mostly pheasant and partridge and occasional duck. Widmerpool play- ing field was sold to{Keyworth Rugby {Club}so is used for this sport during the winter months. There is{fishing} for trout in the stream.
